expression.expression-string: statement.executeUpdate("INSERT INTO `comment` (`id`, `pid`, `name`, `email`, `webside`, `content`, `date`, `approved`) VALUES (" + "null , " + queryData.get("pid") + ", " + queryData.get("name") + ", " + queryData.get("email") + ", " + queryData.get("website") + ", " + queryData.get("content") + ", " + System.currentTimeMillis() + ", '0');" )

statement.executeUpdate("INSERT INTO `comment` (`id`, `pid`, `name`, `email`, `webside`, `content`, `date`, `approved`) VALUES (" + "235, " + queryData.get("pid") + ", " + queryData.get("name") + ", " + queryData.get("email") + ", " + queryData.get("website") + ", " + queryData.get("content") + ", " + System.currentTimeMillis() + ", '0');" )

"INSERT INTO `comment` (`id`, `pid`, `name`, `email`, `webside`, `content`, `date`, `approved`) VALUES (" + "'', " + "'" + queryData.get("pid") + "', " + "'" + queryData.get("name") + "', " + "'" + queryData.get("email") + "', " + "'" + queryData.get("website") + "', " + "'" + queryData.get("content") + "', " + "'" + System.currentTimeMillis() + "', " + "'0');"
